title: The developer/owner shall be entitled for the BUA/TDR in lieu of cost of construction of built up am
clause_text: The developer/owner shall be entitled for the BUA/TDR in lieu of cost of construction of built up amenity under AR as follows: BUA/TDR in lieu of cost of construction of built up amenity handed over under AR
